about_the_game:
Delivery Life Simulator is generally a courier simulation. It is an open-world game that includes different delivery methods, vehicles that can be used, and various mechanics.

Some Features In the Game;
◾ 3+ Cargo Delivery Methods
◾ Side Quests
◾ Driving and Modifying Vehicles
◾ Cycling
◾ Ride A Scooter
◾ Phone System
◾ 20+ Different Shops In Open World

.

Hello Gamers,

We are excited to announce that the demo of our game is now live on Steam! 🎉

In this demo, you can experience the core features and gameplay dynamics of our game, which is still in development. Please keep in mind that this is just a demo; the full version of the game will include much more content and features.

What to Expect in the Demo:
◾Basic Gameplay Mechanics: Get a feel for the basic controls and gameplay flow.
◾Open World Exploration: Experience a slice of our open world and its environment.
◾Single Mission: Try out a single mission that gives you a taste of what’s to come.
Future Enhancements in Early Access:
◾More Detailed Cargo Delivery Missions: Including at least 3 different missions.
◾Side Quests: Additional tasks such as driving jobs.
◾Expanded Map: The map will be 5 times larger, including a bustling city center with over 30 shops.
◾Real Estate: Ability to purchase houses.
◾Vehicle and Clothing Purchases: Buy cars, motorcycles, and outfits.
◾Business Ownership: Open your own business.
◾Detailed Vehicle Modifications: Customize and modify your vehicles in detail.
◾Bug Fixes: A smoother gameplay experience with fewer bugs.
◾Improved Gameplay: Enhancements based on player feedback.
Your feedback and suggestions are incredibly valuable to us. Please don't hesitate to share any thoughts you have. We need your comments to further develop and perfect the game.

Thank you in advance for your support, and happy gaming!

name: Delivery Life Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 @ 3,2 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce RTX 2060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Delivery is difficult. Any type of delivery is more difficult. Become the best in package delivery by climbing all the steps! Buy the most luxurious cars and houses. So, in this simulation and open-world game, join us on a delivery journey that begins with an old bike!
